channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA

item.title: Report E-2023090744
item.description:
Report E-2023090744

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver was loading waste solvent at the location. While loading the middle compartment it overflowed releasing approximately 50 gallons on to the containment pad. The solvent was completely contained on the pad and was recovered back into the tank.

item.title: Report E-2023090840
item.description:
Report E-2023090840

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-03T15:13:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one case of camp fuel (un1268) had been damaged by a sharp object and that one of the poly one gallon jug had released 0.5 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023090490
item.description:
Report X-2023090490

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-03T15:13:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: CEDAR RAPIDS
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The trailer door was opened and the gallon container fell out of the truck. When the container hit the floor one side of the lid was crushed/dented causing a gap that allowed the contents to spill out. DescribePack: Where the lid buckled there is about a 1 inch gap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Cleanup was radioed in and the spill was attended to right away to prevent any further spillage.

item.title: Report E-2023090702
item.description:
Report E-2023090702

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-27T18:15:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the valve of the one 250 gallon metal tote of red kero 50 (un1993) had a mechanical failure and had released 16 ounces of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023090253
item.description:
Report X-2023090253

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-27T18:15:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: SIOUX CITY
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The bottom of the bottle had a crack and leaked out on to the trailer floor, had the PH exit the trailer, cleaned up the spill and placed the package in a red tote with a lid. DescribePack: Bottom of the bottle cracked DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in red tote
